channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street light permanently off, 24th September
item.description:
The street light outside 17 and 19 Boverton Avenue Brockworth is permanently off.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Boverton Avenue, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signs left on pavement near roundabout, 24th September
item.description:
Several signs left on pavements near roundabout on Swindon Road left behind after roadworks some weeks ago
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint Paul's Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Cones and barriers on by pass been there 6 weeks blocking live lane, 24th September
item.description:
By c&g roundabout coming from moons court. Half attempt at repairing something its as though the workmen gave up and disappeared. The barriers and cones have been blocking the inside lane for a good 6 weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree obstructing pavement, 24th September
item.description:
Opposite 34 Greenway Lane Charlton Kings Cheltenham GL52 6LE fallen tree completely obstructing pavement. Also house taken down telegraph cable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Greenway Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, loose gravel, danger to cyclists, 24th September
item.description:
The centre of the cup de sac parking area

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Birch Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No audible safe to cross sound at Pedestrian l crossing lights, 24th September
item.description:
Location on College Rd near London Rd junction , Joins both Sandford Parks and used by many elderly people some who have sight impairment. There has never been any audible safe to cross sound .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The whole of Carlton Street from no 1 to no 60 needs resurfacing it is dangerous, 24th September
item.description:
The entire road from no1 to no 60 Carlton Street
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carlton Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unstable bench, 24th September
item.description:
Bench only secured with 1 pin (instead of 6) to ground. Also leaning. Very unstable. When facing towards the Gardens Gallery it is on left, the second one away from the gallery.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Terrace, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant issue with school traffic, 24th September
item.description:
Cars parking on this road during school pick up times. They force two lanes of traffic into one, and often cars entering Collyberry Road are forced to reverse back onto Station Road. Double yellow lines are desperately needed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Collyberry Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 24th September
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level different replace x1 900x600x20mm sunken broken replace with tarmac patch stats required number 2 (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
